articles.title: News Zidane far from convincing when asked about Bale's future - Football365.com
articles.description: Football365 - "Gareth is a Real Madrid player with two years left on his contract," says Zidane. He's not wrong, you know.
articles.content: Zinedine Zidane offered no assurances on Gareth Bale ‘s Real Madrid future after whistles were directed at the Welshman during their 2-1 victory over Eibar at the Bernabeu. Karim Benzema struck twice in the second half following a goal from Marc Cardona, who … [+941 chars]

articles.title: England men sevens finish sixth in Hong Kong - England Rugby
articles.description: England men sevens endured a disappointing final day at the Hong Kong Sevens losing to both Samoa and New Zealand.
articles.content: England men endured a disappointing final day at the HSBC Hong Kong Sevens losing to both Samoa and New Zealand. Simon Amor's side had progressed through to the Cup quarter-finals courtesy of three pool victories over Wales, Spain and USA but were beaten 14-1… [+1864 chars]
